ta.title: பல காவல்துறைத் தலைவர்களுக்கு திடீரென இடமாற்றம் செய்கிறது
body_lines: ஃபீல்ட் ஃபோர்ஸ் தலைமையகத்தின் பொறுப்பில் தோண்டவும். நான். D. R. விஜேசிங்கே நுவரா எலியா மாவட்டத்தின் ஐ.ஜி.பி.

en.title: Sudden transfers to a number of police chiefs
body_lines: Transfers have been transferred to 15 DIGs, including 6 DIGs.
DIG in charge of Field Force Headquarters. I. D. R. Wijesinghe has been transferred to the IGP of the Nuwara Eliya district.

summary_lines: Several police chiefs were suddenly reassigned, with 15 being moved to Divisional Inspectors General (DIG) roles, including six now overseeing Field Force Headquarters. Notably, I.D.R. Wijesinghe was transferred to serve as the Inspector General of Police for the Nuwara Eliya district.
